reviews.text: You'll find it if you take a walk on Passeig de Colom,not very far from Columbus monument.A big,strange lobster,with a smiling face.

Barcelona has many modern art sculptures.
"La Gamba" - The Shrimp - is of of them.
It is a funny and beautful sculpture.
I think, that the sculpture is more similar to a lobster. But, you know: We have artistic freedom.
La Gamba is designed by Xavier Mariscal.
It is made of fibreglass.
Originally was La Gamba a part of the decor at the Gambrinus seafood restaurant.
La Gamba is located on the boardwalk between Passieg de Colom and Port Vell, close to Barceloneta

Fun and amusing. Hard to walk past without smiling. Fun doe adults and children. Another weird and rather wonderful city centre sculpture. Makes you feel that maybe everything isn't that bad after all.
